articles.description: A material called red matter, after the colour change it undergoes when subjected to pressure, was hailed as a potential room temperature superconductor, but now other researchers are finding they can't replicate the results

Attempts to recreate red matter under various pressures failed to replicate the material’s changing colour
Nanjing University
Red matter, a material that researchers last week claimed showed eviden… [+400 chars]
